name: Melissa
placeOfBirth: Kellyborough, British Indian Ocean Territory (Chagos Archipelago)
description: Melissa is a hazel-eyed llama with blonde hair, standing 118 cm tall. Originally from Kellyborough, British Indian Ocean Territory (Chagos Archipelago), Melissa enjoys dancing, gardening, singing. Known for their curious and mischievous personality, Melissa is a beloved member of the llama community.
